Container.Name: Bitwarden Portal
Container.Overview: Automate backup and restore between Bitwarden and/or Vaultwarden vault.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: passwords bitwarden vaultwarden sync server backup restore

Config.Name: Backup Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Cron schedule for backup and restore tasks

Config.Name: Encryption Password
Config.Description: This is the password used to encrypt and decrypt the backup files during the sync process.

Config.Name: Source - URL
Config.Description: The URL of the source Bitwarden/Vaultwarden server.

Config.Name: Source - Username
Config.Description: The username of the source Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account.

Config.Name: Source - Password
Config.Description: The password of the source Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account.

Config.Name: Source - Client ID
Config.Description: The client ID of the source Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account, found in Account Settings -> Security -> Keys

Config.Name: Source - Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret of the source Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account, found in Account Settings -> Security -> Keys

Config.Name: Destination - URL
Config.Description: The URL of the destination Bitwarden/Vaultwarden server.

Config.Name: Destination - Username
Config.Description: The username of the destination Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account.

Config.Name: Destination - Password
Config.Description: The password of the destination Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account.

Config.Name: Destination - Client ID
Config.Description: The client ID of the destination Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account, found in Account Settings -> Security -> Keys

Config.Name: Destination - Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret of the destination Bitwarden/Vaultwarden account, found in Account Settings -> Security -> Keys

Config.Name: Retention Days
Config.Description: Retention policy for backup files. Backups older than this value will be deleted.

Config.Name: Minimum File Count
Config.Description: If all backups are older than the retention day setting, keep the following minimum files.
